main event: A resident of Anaheim, California reported observing a bright, circular object in the sky on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 30 feet in diameter and hovering at an altitude of about 3,000 feet., It emitted a bright, pulsating light., The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes before the object accelerated and disappeared., No physical evidence or additional witnesses were found to corroborate the sighting., The case was investigated and classified as UNKNOWN by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: bright, circular object emitting a pulsating light
witness description: Mr. John Smith, a resident of Anaheim
